title: 2005년 Peoples 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Peoples. 판결일: 2005-07-01. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Marcus Peoples
**판결일**: 2005-07-01
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 20 A.D.3d 924
- 797 N.Y.S.2d 336

## 판결문 요약


Appeal from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Erie County (Mario J. Rossetti, A.J.), rendered January 31, 2003. The judgment convicted defendant, upon his plea of guilty, of attempted robbery in the first degree.
It is hereby ordered that the judgment so appealed from be and the same hereby is unanimously affirmed (see People v Hidalgo, 91 NY2d 733, 737 [1998]). Present—Green, J.P., Gorski, Martoche, Smith and Hayes, JJ.
...

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
